original_title: Once Upon a Time in Huanghuatang
overview: To search for her grandmother Lin Qinglianâ€™s last wish, Xiao Cao, a young teenage girl from Beijing, came to Huanghua Pond where her grandma joined the New Fourth Army at an early age. Here she discovered an unknown love story which has been buried over 70 years.
title: Once Upon a Time in Huanghuatang
